Dzvinka Koman

San Francisco, CA, USA | Berlin, Germany

About me

My name is Dzvenyslava Koman. Though, almost everyone calls me Dzvinka. You can check this this link if you are curious how to pronounce my name :) As of fall 2021, I am a junior at Minerva University majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Political Science with expected date of graduation in May 2023. Here is a quick summary of my interest:

  • I love learning languages. I speak Ukrainian, Russian, Polish, English, and German fluently. When it comes to coding languages, I feel most comfortable with Python. I have some experience with JavaScript, Swift, R, and Prolog.
  • I love travelling, and I am currently doing a semester abroad in Berlin, Germany. For my studies, I spend each semester in a different city around the world. So far, as a part of my university education, I have lived and worked in San Francisco (USA), London (UK), Seoul (South Korea), and Berlin (Germany).
  • I am interested in the applications of technologies in the financial sector -- be it fintech, banking, social impact projects or blockchain. I have recently done a Python project that executes trades based on the ML analysis it performs. Please, see the details in the Projects section below.

Please feel free to poke around the website and read those sections which most interest you, or get in touch with me through my social media links below or at dzvenyslava.koman@uni.minerva.edu. Thank you for your visit!
